Visualizing CPU Pipelining.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
instructions <- c("add $t1", "sub $t2", "lw $t3", "add $t5", "and $t4")
stages <- c("IF", "ID", "EX", "MEM", "WB")

# Generate instruction list
generate_instruction_list <- function(instructions) {
  items <- character(length(instructions))
  for(i in seq_along(instructions)) {
    items[i] <- sprintf(
      '<div class="instruction %s">%s</div>',
      if(i == 1) "active" else "",
      instructions[i]
    )
  }
  paste(items, collapse="\n")
}

# Generate pipeline stages
generate_pipeline_stages <- function() {
  stages_html <- character(length(stages))
  for(i in seq_along(stages)) {
    stages_html[i] <- sprintf(
      '<div class="stage-container">
         <div class="stage-name">%s</div>
         <div class="stage" data-stage="%s"></div>
       </div>',
      stages[i],
      tolower(stages[i])
    )
  }
  paste(stages_html, collapse="\n")
}
```

```{=html}

<script>
let unpipelinedStep = 0;
const unpipelinedInstructions = ["add $t1", "sub $t2", "lw $t3", "add $t5", "and $t4"];
const stagesPerInstruction = 5;

function updateUnpipelined() {
  const container = document.querySelector('.unpipelined-container');
  const stages = container.querySelectorAll('.stage');
  const instructionElements = container.querySelectorAll('.instruction');
  
  // Clear all stages
  stages.forEach(stage => {
    stage.textContent = '';
    stage.classList.remove('active');
  });
  
  // Calculate current instruction and stage
  const currentInstruction = Math.floor(unpipelinedStep / stagesPerInstruction);
  const currentStage = unpipelinedStep % stagesPerInstruction;
  
  if (currentInstruction < unpipelinedInstructions.length) {
    // Show current instruction in current stage
    stages[currentStage].textContent = unpipelinedInstructions[currentInstruction];
    stages[currentStage].classList.add('active');
    
    // Update instruction list highlighting
    instructionElements.forEach((inst, index) => {
      if (index === currentInstruction) {
        inst.classList.add('active');
      } else {
        inst.classList.remove('active');
      }
    });
  }
}

function unpipelinedStepForward() {
  const maxSteps = unpipelinedInstructions.length * stagesPerInstruction;
  if (unpipelinedStep < maxSteps) {
    unpipelinedStep++;
    updateUnpipelined();
  }
}

function unpipelinedStepBack() {
  if (unpipelinedStep > 0) {
    unpipelinedStep--;
    updateUnpipelined();
  }
}

function unpipelinedReset() {
  unpipelinedStep = 0;
  updateUnpipelined();
}

// Initialize
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Only initialize if the container exists
  if (document.querySelector('.unpipelined-container')) {
    unpipelinedReset();
  }
});
</script>
```

```{=html}
<script>
let currentStep = 0;
const maxSteps = 25; // Total number of steps
const instructions = ["add $t1", "sub $t2", "lw $t3", "add $t5", "and $t4"];

function updatePipeline() {
  const container = document.querySelector('.pipeline-container');
  const stages = container.querySelectorAll('.stage');
  const instructionElements = container.querySelectorAll('.instruction');

  // Clear all stages
  stages.forEach(stage => {
    stage.textContent = '';
    stage.classList.remove('active');
  });
  
  // Update each stage based on current step
  for(let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
    const instructionIndex = currentStep - i;
    if (instructionIndex >= 0 && instructionIndex < instructions.length) {
      stages[i].textContent = instructions[instructionIndex];
      stages[i].classList.add('active');
    }
  }
  
  // Update instruction list highlighting
  instructionElements.forEach((inst, index) => {
    if (index === Math.min(currentStep, instructions.length - 1)) {
      inst.classList.add('active');
    } else {
      inst.classList.remove('active');
    }
  });
}

function stepForward() {
  if (currentStep < maxSteps) {
    currentStep++;
    updatePipeline();
  }
}

function stepBack() {
  if (currentStep > 0) {
    currentStep--;
    updatePipeline();
  }
}

function resetAnimation() {
  currentStep = 0;
  updatePipeline();
}

// Initialize
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  resetAnimation();
});
</script>
```
